title: Return number of documents deleted when deleting by query
description: It would be nice if the response from a <delete> by query returned the number of documents deleted.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content:
One reason I never did this is because it greatly constrains implementation.

If delete queries ever became buffered like delete terms currently are, then it would not be possible to return the number deleted.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Cleaning up old JIRAs, re-open if necessary
